name: ​Color Containment (installer)
description:
Color Containment is first player shooter (FPS) game. This planet is being attack by aliens. Find out the color pattern and fight against them.

Notes:

This game is a current project of Full Sail University students , team W.A.W.D.

Developers:

Nathan Wilson Rafael Garcia  (akatsukiyidan@gmail.com) Wan Chee Kiang (victoriakiang0801@gmail.com) Connor Brandt  (lego.brandt@gmail.com) Damien Thew Jun Jie Chen

Note: This is the game installer version
